title: Update member selling preferences
description: Updates the selling preferences of the authenticated member
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: OnlyAuthenticatedMembersCanBid
fields.description: Determines if only authenticated members can bid on the listings. Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: DonationRecipient
fields.description: Indicates the user would like to round up their success fees to the nearest dollar and donate the difference to the selected charity.

fields.name: ShowPickUpLocation
fields.description: Determines if the listings with pick-up option will be available for Sell Local. When true, the three-tier region/district/suburb location will be displayed for listings with pick-up option. Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: PickUpSuburbId
fields.description: The pick-up suburb id. It uses the three-tier region/district/suburb system. Required when Sell Local is enabled (ShowPickUpLocation is true). Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

returns.description: <SellingPreferencesResponse> Indicates whether or not the operation succeeded.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
